title: Railroad.Tycoon.3.Coast.to.Coast.REPACK-vol1
description:
Railroad.Tycoon.3.coast.to.coast.REPACK-vol1

Railroad Tycoon 3, including the add-on "Coast to Coast" and patched to version 1.05 (latest/final). 

Additional content:
- unofficial patch v1.06 that you can install, if you choose to (rt3_unofficial_patch_1.06.zip)
- "Vista fix", a modified configuration file, is already  applied
- texture fix - if your graphics are blurry, unpack the file named "RT3-texture_fix.zip" into your game folder
- mini game (RT3Game.exe)
- the movie files from disc 2, which are not played due to the no-cd fix. You can watch them with the bink video player. (cd2movies)

Not included are the "UserSkinningTools" and the "map builder" (!= editor). The 3 bonus maps Eastern China, Pacific Coastal and Spanish Mainline are already included with the Coast to Coast add-on.

1. Mount or unpack .iso
2. Install
3. Play
